q1.question: Is Flowxtra free to use for posting job?
q1.answer: Yes! Flowxtra offers a completely FREE plan with UNLIMITED job postings — forever. No credit card required, no hidden fees, no limits. Post as many jobs as you need across your career page and Google Jobs.

q2.question: Can I upgrade my Flowxtra plan later if needed?
q2.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to a higher plan at any time to access more features and higher limits.

q3.question: What features are included in each plan?
q3.answer: Plans offer various features such as increased job posting limits, team collaboration tools, hiring pipelines, email templates, AI chatbot integration, and custom domain support.

q4.question: Does every plan include AI chatbot support?
q4.answer: Yes, soon every plan will include an AI chatbot. Flowxtra does not perform AI scoring or matching. Our AI chatbot simply helps recruiters filter applicants faster — for example, by asking "Who knows JavaScript or PHP?" the system quickly searches through CVs and displays matching names. When you click on a name, the applicant's full CV details appear.

q5.question: What is the Custom Domain feature?
q5.answer: The Custom Domain feature allows you to use your own domain name for your company page.

q6.question: Can I integrate Flowxtra with other applications?
q6.answer: Yes, all plans include an API token for third-party app integration and automation.

q7.question: Is Flowxtra a job platform or a recruitment system?
q7.answer:
Flowxtra is more than just an ATS — it's a flexible AI-powered recruitment platform. Companies can use Flowxtra in two ways:

• As a public job platform: Publish jobs for free across Flowxtra and partner networks like Google Jobs, LinkedIn, and more.

• As a private hiring system: Set up your own branded ATS where only your team manages candidate data, interviews, and hiring — fully secure and self-hosted.

We specialize in building custom recruitment software tailored to your business needs, whether you're a startup or a large enterprise.

q8.question: Is Flowxtra suitable for small, medium, and large companies?
q8.answer: Yes, absolutely. Flowxtra is built to adapt to every business size — whether you're a startup, a growing company, or a large enterprise. The platform scales automatically to match your hiring volume, team structure, and workflow needs. It's perfect for small teams that need a simple and efficient way to manage job posts, as well as for global corporations that handle thousands of candidates daily — all with the same reliability, speed, and security.

q9.question: Can Flowxtra handle thousands of job applications?
q9.answer: Yes, it can. Flowxtra's modern cloud-based architecture is designed for performance and scalability. It can easily process and organize thousands of job applications without slowing down, ensuring that HR teams of any size can work efficiently, even during high recruitment periods.

q10.question: Flowxtra complies with the European AI Act for recruitment systems?
q10.answer:
Yes, Flowxtra is fully compliant with the EU AI Act (Regulation 2024/1689) and GDPR.

What does that mean?

Flowxtra is not an automated decision-making tool. It does not use artificial intelligence to:
• Score, rank, or filter applicants
• Select or recommend "the best candidate"
• Perform automated profiling or matching

Instead, Flowxtra is a human-first Applicant Tracking System (ATS). Our AI is used only to:
• Help companies write job ads faster
• Assist in communication with applicants
• Automate job posting to platforms like LinkedIn and Google Jobs

You stay fully in control of all hiring decisions. Flowxtra never replaces human judgment.

q11.question: Flowxtra is fully compliant with the EU AI Act?
q11.answer:
No, based on the current legal interpretation by Austria's regulatory body RTR (KI-Servicestelle), Flowxtra is not classified as a high-risk AI system — as long as:

• No automated decision-making or filtering is used
• The AI is only used to assist, not to decide
• Interactions with AI (e.g., chatbots) are clearly disclosed
• Flowxtra does not process sensitive personal data like gender, origin, or religion

All AI use is transparent, explainable, and compliant with Article 50 of the EU AI Act.

q12.question: Flowxtra is fully compliant with the GDPR and DSGVO?
q12.answer:
Yes, Flowxtra is fully compliant with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the Datenschutz-Grundverordnung (DSGVO).

We do not process sensitive personal data such as gender, ethnicity, religion, or political beliefs. Candidate data is stored securely and managed exclusively by the company using the platform.

Flowxtra does not make automated decisions about candidates. Employers retain full control over all applicant data and hiring decisions.

Our systems include transparent consent management, data access controls, and a clear procedure for candidates to request data deletion or submit complaints, in line with Articles 12–23 of the GDPR.

All data is hosted in the European Union, and our infrastructure follows industry best practices for security and data protection.

about.title: Building the Future of Recruitment
about.description: Flowxtra is on a mission to transform how businesses hire talent. We combine cutting-edge AI technology with intuitive design to make recruitment faster, smarter, and more accessible for everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that finding and hiring the right talent shouldn't be complicated or expensive. That's why we've built Flowxtra—a comprehensive platform that simplifies every step of the recruitment process.
mission.description2: From posting jobs across multiple platforms to managing candidates with AI-powered filtering, we're here to help businesses of all sizes build stronger teams.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push the boundaries of what's possible in recruitment technology.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We believe in honest, clear communication and transparent pricing—no hidden fees, ever.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: Your data is secure. We're GDPR compliant and store all data in EU servers with the highest security standards.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Based in Vienna, Austria, we're a dedicated team of developers, designers, and HR professionals passionate about making recruitment better for everyone.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.subtitle: Our Commitment to Web Accessibility and WCAG Compliance

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: Flowxtra is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We continually improve the user experience for everyone and apply relevant accessibility standards to achieve our goals of equal access to information and functionality for all users.

wcagStandards.title: WCAG Compliance Standards
wcagStandards.paragraph1: Our website aims to conform to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA standards. These guidelines explain how to make web content more accessible for people with disabilities and user-friendly for everyone.

perceivable.title: Perceivable
perceivable.description: Information and user interface components must be presentable to users in ways they can perceive.

operable.title: Operable
operable.description: User interface components and navigation must be operable.

understandable.title: Understandable
understandable.description: Information and the operation of user interface must be understandable.

robust.title: Robust
robust.description: Content must be robust enough that it can be interpreted by a wide variety of user agents, including assistive technologies.

keyboardNavigation.title: Keyboard Navigation
keyboardNavigation.description: All interactive elements can be accessed using keyboard-only navigation. Use Tab to move forward, Shift+Tab to move backward, and Enter or Space to activate buttons and links.

screenReaderSupport.title: Screen Reader Support
screenReaderSupport.description: Our website includes proper semantic HTML, ARIA labels, and alt text for images to ensure compatibility with screen readers and other assistive technologies.

colorContrast.title: Color Contrast
colorContrast.description: Text and background colors meet WCAG AA standards for color contrast ratios, ensuring content is readable for users with visual impairments.

responsiveDesign.title: Responsive Design
responsiveDesign.description: Our website is fully responsive and can be accessed on various devices and screen sizes, with support for zoom up to 200% without losing functionality.

knownIssues.title: Known Issues and Limitations
knownIssues.paragraph1: Despite our efforts to ensure accessibility, there may be some limitations. We are actively working to address these issues and improve our website's accessibility.
knownIssues.paragraph2: If you encounter any accessibility barriers, please contact us using the information provided below.

feedback.title: Feedback and Contact
feedback.paragraph1: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of Flowxtra. If you have encountered any accessibility barriers, or if you have suggestions for improvement, please contact us:

updates.title: Updates to This Statement
updates.paragraph1: We regularly review and update this accessibility statement to reflect our ongoing commitment and progress. This statement was last updated on {date}.

conformance.title: Conformance Status
conformance.paragraph1: The Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) defines requirements for designers and developers to improve accessibility for people with disabilities.
conformance.paragraph2: Flowxtra website aims to conform to WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards. We are continuously working to improve our website's accessibility and welcome feedback from users.

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms & Conditions
paymentTerms.subtitle: How commissions are calculated and paid

terms.title: Commission Period
terms.description: Commission is paid every month for up to 12 months as long as your referred users stay subscribed. Maximum commission period is 12 months per referral.

terms.title: Monthly Credit
terms.description: Each month a user pays their subscription, 50% of the payment is automatically credited to your affiliate account.

terms.title: Minimum Withdrawal
terms.description: The minimum balance required to withdraw earnings is €180. You can accumulate earnings until you reach this threshold.

terms.title: Withdrawal Process
terms.description: Once you reach €180 or more, you can request a withdrawal. Payments are processed monthly via bank transfer or PayPal.

pricingReference.title: Our Pricing Plans
pricingReference.subtitle: Refer users to any of these plans and earn commissions

cta.title: Ready to Start Earning?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of affiliates promoting Flowxtra

q1.question: How do I get my referral link?
q1.answer: After signing up for our affiliate program, you'll receive a unique referral link that you can share with potential customers.

q2.question: When do I get paid?
q2.answer: Commission is credited to your account each month as long as your referred users stay subscribed. You can withdraw once your balance reaches €180 or more.

q3.question: How long do commissions last?
q3.answer: Commissions are paid monthly for up to 12 months per referral, as long as the user stays subscribed during that period. After 12 months, no further commission is paid for that referral.

q4.question: What if a user cancels?
q4.answer: You'll receive commissions only for the months the user was subscribed. Once they cancel, no further commissions will be earned from that user.

q5.question: What is the minimum withdrawal amount?
q5.answer: The minimum withdrawal amount is €180. You can accumulate earnings in your account until you reach this threshold, then request a withdrawal.

q6.question: What happens after 12 months?
q6.answer: After 12 months, your commission for that customer stops. We only pay commission for the first 12 months of the customer's subscription. If the customer renews after the first year, no commission is paid on those renewals.

Intelligently parses contact details, work experience, education, skills, and qualifications to populate candidate profiles instantly.

smtp.description: Connect your company's SMTP server to send emails directly from your own email address through our platform. Send candidate communications, notifications, and updates using your branded email domain.

jobWidget.name: Job widget
jobWidget.description: Embed your job list on any website with a copy-paste snippet.

atsIntegrations.name: ATS integrations
atsIntegrations.description: Connect Flowxtra with your HR stack, websites, and internal tools.

twoFactorAuth.name: Two-factor authentication
twoFactorAuth.description: Protect accounts with an extra verification step at login. Also known as 2FA.

crmIntegration.name: Integration with CRM systems
crmIntegration.description: Sync candidate and client data with your CRM for seamless workflows.

apiMcp.name: API/MCP
apiMcp.description: Complete documentation for integrating Flowxtra with your custom systems and LLMs. Includes detailed API references, MCP protocol guides, code examples, and integration tutorials.

companyPage.name: Company page
companyPage.description: Get a branded subdomain with your company profile and jobs.

customLlms.name: Custom LLMs Integration
customLlms.description: Integrate your own LLMs that are hosted on your infrastructure. We provide the integration tools (API & MCP) so your AI models can work seamlessly within Flowxtra while staying in your environment.

sslCertificate.name: SSL Certificate
sslCertificate.description: Free SSL certificate for your subdomain. Every company gets a free subdomain from Flowxtra, and each subdomain receives a free SSL certificate from us to ensure secure connections.

privacyGenerator.name: Privacy policy generator
privacyGenerator.description: Create customized privacy policies tailored to your needs. Choose from pre-built templates for different privacy regulations (GDPR, CCPA, etc.) and customize the text to match your company requirements. Generate professional, legally-compliant privacy policies without legal expertise.

smartFiltering.name: Smart candidate filtering
smartFiltering.description: Auto-prioritizes applicants based on role requirements and custom criteria.

customFields.name: Custom fields on jobs
customFields.description: Add any fields you need to structure job data and forms.

rolesPermissions.name: Roles & permissions
rolesPermissions.description: Granular access control for recruiters, hiring managers, and admins.

hiringStages.name: Hiring stages
hiringStages.description: Customizable hiring stages. Define and manage recruitment phases like application review, interviews, assessments, and final decisions. Fully customizable to match your unique hiring workflow.

appStoreIntegrations.name: App store integrations
appStoreIntegrations.description: Plug-and-play integrations with popular HR, comms, and analytics tools.

accessibilityWcag.name: Accessibility WCAG
accessibilityWcag.description: Full compliance with Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA standards. Ensures your career pages and application forms are accessible to all users, including those with disabilities. Includes screen reader support, keyboard navigation, proper color contrast, and semantic HTML structure.

ratingSheets.name: Rating sheets
ratingSheets.description: Structured scorecards to evaluate candidates consistently.

customSocialSharing.name: Custom social sharing
customSocialSharing.description: Customize OG tags, banners, and captions for job links.

brandKit.name: Brand Kit
brandKit.description: Customize your entire system with your brand colors, fonts, and logo. Your career pages, emails, and all candidate-facing content will reflect your brand identity consistently.

emailTemplates.name: Email template builder
emailTemplates.description: Design and customize email templates for all candidate communications. Create branded, professional emails with your own design, layout, and messaging.

automatedMessages.name: Automated messages
automatedMessages.description: Send automatic confirmations, rejections, and reminders to candidates.

customCareerPage.name: Custom career page
customCareerPage.description: Build rich careers pages with sections for culture, benefits, and teams. Supports multi-section layouts.

customDomain.name: Custom domain
customDomain.description: Use your own domain for careers pages and application forms.

skillsReservoir.name: Skills reservoir
skillsReservoir.description: Store and organize top candidates who didn't get hired for future opportunities. Build a database of qualified talent ready for upcoming positions that match their skills.

unlimitedStorage.name: Unlimited data storage
unlimitedStorage.description: Store files, resumes, and activity logs without hard caps.

journeyFlow.name: Journey flow
journeyFlow.description: Advanced workflow automation builder (like n8n). Create custom recruitment processes with conditional paths based on candidate responses. Auto-send welcome emails, request additional info, send contracts, training courses, and create dynamic workflows with triggers, wait times, conditions, and multiple branches. Build personalized candidate journeys for each job with smart segmentation based on location, answers, or any custom criteria.

aiJobAdBuilder.name: AI job ad builder
aiJobAdBuilder.description: Generate optimized job descriptions aligned to role requirements.

clientProfiles.name: Client profiles
clientProfiles.description: Manage multiple client companies with separate jobs and teams. Perfect for agencies.

multiOfficeLocation.name: Multi office location
multiOfficeLocation.description: Organize jobs, users, and reports by location. Support for multi-location companies.

newsletter.name: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Send automated job alerts to candidates who opted-in during application. Notify them about new opportunities via email, SMS, WhatsApp, or Telegram. Includes Mailchimp integration for advanced campaigns and automatic job vacancy notifications.

talentPool.name: Talent pool
talentPool.description: Maintain a database of silver-medalist and future-fit candidates.

reportsAnalytics.name: Reports & analytics
reportsAnalytics.description: Insights on sources, pipeline speed, drop-off, and team productivity. Includes detailed applicant reports.

databaseMigration.name: Database migration
databaseMigration.description: We help import candidates, jobs, and notes from other systems.

candidateExport.name: Candidate export
candidateExport.description: Export lists and reports for external analysis and backups. Supports CSV and Excel formats.

candidateImport.name: Candidate import
candidateImport.description: Import candidate data from CSV, Excel, and other ATS systems. Bulk upload candidates with automatic data mapping and validation.

esignature.name: eSignature
esignature.description: Send, sign, and track legally binding digital contracts with audit trails and timestamps.

elearning.name: E-learning
elearning.description: Train hiring teams with built-in courses and certifications. Includes company-specific course creation.

assessments.name: Assessments
assessments.description: Skills and personality tests with structured, comparable results.

socialAdsManager.name: Social Ads Manager
socialAdsManager.description: Create and manage job advertisements across major platforms including Facebook, Instagram, SnapChat, Google, YouTube, TikTok, and LinkedIn. Save on additional fees by managing all your social media advertising directly within Flowxtra.

idVerification.name: ID Verification
idVerification.description: Verify candidate identity documents including passports, national IDs, and other official identification documents for enhanced security and compliance.

applyViaSocialChatbot.name: Apply via social Chatbot
applyViaSocialChatbot.description: Connect your company's own WhatsApp Business, Telegram, Facebook Messenger, Discord, or WeChat accounts. Candidates apply directly through your business chat, reducing costs while maintaining direct communication with applicants.

candidatePresentation.name: Candidate presentation
candidatePresentation.description: Generate secure shareable links to present candidate profiles with your notes and comments to clients, managers, or external partners. Share specific candidate information without granting full system access. Candidates consent to information sharing in advance. Perfect for recruitment agencies presenting profiles to clients or internal stakeholders reviewing candidates.

socialMediaPosts.name: Social media posts
socialMediaPosts.description: Schedule and publish unlimited posts, stories, videos, and any content across all social media platforms. Full content scheduling and management system.

aiChatbot.name: AI Chatbot
aiChatbot.description: Answer candidate FAQs and pre-screen directly on your careers pages.

oneWayVideo.name: One-way video interviews
oneWayVideo.description: Candidates can record and upload video responses during the application process. Screen candidates asynchronously by reviewing pre-recorded video answers to your custom questions. Save time by watching responses on your schedule without coordinating live interview times.

employeeOnboarding.name: Employee onboarding
employeeOnboarding.description: Streamline new hire integration with automated onboarding workflows. Send employment documents, contracts, and training materials. Create customizable checklists for new employees, schedule their first days, introduce them to the team, and track their progress. Complete onboarding journey from offer acceptance to full productivity.

cookieConsent.description: Manage your cookie preferences. You can enable or disable different types of cookies below.

strictlyNecessary.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They cannot be disabled.

performance.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

targeting.description: These cookies are used to deliver personalized advertisements and track advertising campaign performance.

doNotSell.description: Under CCPA, you have the right to opt-out of the sale of your personal information.

consentId.title: Your Consent ID
consentId.description: This unique ID proves you gave consent. Save it for your records or future reference.

banner.descriptionUS: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can manage your preferences at any time. See our

aboutCookies.intro: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyse website traffic. By clicking "Accept All," you agree to all cookies. You can manage preferences in Cookie Settings.
aboutCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer by websites that you visit. Websites use cookies to help users navigate efficiently and perform certain functions. Cookies that are required for the website to operate properly are allowed to be set without your permission. All other cookies need to be approved before they can be set in the browser.
aboutCookies.changeConsent: You can change your consent to cookie usage at any time on our

blog.description: Welcome to the Flowxtra Blog — your source for smart hiring insights, HR innovations, and recruiting trends. Discover practical strategies, expert tips, and the latest updates shaping the future of recruitment and talent management.

socialMediaManagement.title: Social Media Management
socialMediaManagement.description: Manage and analyze your social channels from one platform. Our Social Media Manager saves time, keeps you organized, and helps grow your online presence.
socialMediaManagement.imageAlt: Social Media Management Platform - Manage all your social channels from one place
socialMediaManagement.figcaption: Manage and analyze your social channels from one platform

section1.title: Run your social media like a business, not a burden
section1.description: Connect all your social media accounts — Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok, and X — and manage them from one smart dashboard.
section1.paragraph1: No more switching between tools or wasting hours on repetitive tasks.
section1.paragraph2: Flowxtra helps you plan, post, and analyze your social media activity in one place — keeping your brand consistent, efficient, and always active.

section2.title: Your Data Stays Yours
section2.description: Flowxtra gives you full control over your data.
section2.paragraph1: All your files are securely stored in your own connected storage — Google Drive, Dropbox, or AWS — not on our servers.
section2.paragraph2: We only keep the minimal technical data required to connect and synchronize your services seamlessly.
section2.paragraph3: Your privacy, your control, your data — always protected.

section3.title: Plan and Control Every Post from One Visual Calendar
section3.description: Stop switching between platforms or guessing what to post next.
section3.paragraph1: Flowxtra's Visual Content Calendar brings all your scheduled posts — across Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok, and X — into one clear, unified view.

features.feature2: Drag and drop to adjust instantly.
features.feature3: Stay consistent and never miss a post.

section3.paragraph2: Plan campaigns, track performance, and keep your entire social strategy perfectly organized — all from one smart, visual workspace.

section4.title: Your AI Assistant for Effortless Content Creation
section4.description: Stop wasting time on blank screens.
section4.paragraph1: Flowxtra's built-in AI Assistant helps you craft engaging posts, generate creative captions, and adapt your tone for every platform — whether it's LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok, or X.

features.feature2: Optimize tone and language for each channel.
features.feature3: Save time while keeping your brand consistent.

section4.paragraph2: Create high-performing content in seconds and keep your social media active — without draining your team's energy.

section5.title: Create and Share Pipelines — Without Giving Full Access
section5.description: Collaborate securely with your team or partners using Flowxtra Pipelines.
section5.paragraph1: Assign specific social media accounts, generate a unique shareable link, and let others create or publish posts — all without accessing your Flowxtra dashboard or social accounts.

features.feature1: Share publishing access via secure links.
features.feature2: Create pipelines for teams, clients, or departments.
features.feature3: Control permissions and keep full platform security.

section5.paragraph2: Perfect for marketing agencies, large teams, and companies with multiple departments — empowering collaboration without compromising control.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Hire Smarter and Faster?
ctaSection.description: Stop wasting time switching between job boards. Post jobs, track applicants, and hire top talent—all from one intelligent recruiting platform.

q1.question: Is Flowxtra Social Media Management free to use?
q1.answer: Yes — Flowxtra Social Media Management offers a free plan that includes up to 4 social media accounts. You can connect your accounts from Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok, and X, manage them from one dashboard, schedule posts, and analyze your activity at no cost. If you need more than 4 accounts, you can upgrade to a paid plan. The only paid feature is the Social Media Pipeline, which allows you to collaborate with teams and partners without giving full access to your accounts.

q2.question: What is Social Media Pipeline and why do I need it?
q2.answer: Social Media Pipeline is a paid feature that enables secure collaboration. With one Pipeline subscription, you can assign up to 2 social media accounts to team members, clients, or departments, generate unique shareable links, and let others create or publish posts—all without accessing your Flowxtra dashboard or social accounts. It's perfect for marketing agencies, large teams, and companies with multiple departments who need to empower collaboration without compromising control.

q3.question: How many social media accounts can I connect?
q3.answer: With the free plan, you can connect up to 4 social media accounts from different platforms (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok, X) to your Flowxtra dashboard. All accounts are managed from one unified interface, making it easy to plan, schedule, and track your social media activity across all platforms. If you need more than 4 accounts, you can upgrade to a paid subscription plan.

q4.question: Can I schedule posts for multiple platforms at once?
q4.answer: Yes! Flowxtra's Visual Content Calendar allows you to schedule posts across all your connected platforms (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok, and X) from one place. Schedule once and publish everywhere, or customize posts for each platform individually. You can also drag and drop to adjust your posting schedule instantly.

q5.question: Where is my data stored?
q5.answer: Your privacy and data security are our top priorities. All your files are securely stored in your own connected storage—Google Drive, Dropbox, or AWS—not on our servers. Flowxtra only keeps the minimal technical data required to connect and synchronize your services seamlessly. Your data stays yours, always protected.

q6.question: Does Flowxtra have an AI assistant for content creation?
q6.answer: Yes! Flowxtra includes a built-in AI Assistant that helps you craft engaging posts, generate creative captions, and adapt your tone for every platform. Whether you're creating content for LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok, or X, the AI Assistant can generate ideas and captions instantly, optimize tone and language for each channel, and save time while keeping your brand consistent.

q7.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q7.answer: Yes, absolutely. Since the core Social Media Management features are free, you can use them indefinitely without any commitment. If you're using the paid Social Media Pipeline feature, you can cancel anytime without any penalties or long-term contracts.
